reviews.positive_text: We took the family room and it was perfect for 4 of us.  The hotel is immaculate and was so clean, light and airy the room was very big at the front with a fabulous view of the port.
reviews.negative_text: The only downside with the room was also a positive. The hotel is located on the main road with lots of bars and restaurants, this made it very noisy at night until the morning, with people and then cleaning and bottle noises.  I would not say that it is a negative point on the hotel at all as when we booked we knew its location but just something to note.

reviews.positive_text: Great location, breakfast was good and the air conditioning was excellent.

reviews.review_title: Nice accommodation for solo traveller, excellent location and quiet
reviews.positive_text: Comfortable bed
reviews.negative_text: Very small shower

reviews.positive_text: The staff are very helpful!
reviews.negative_text: No elevator or free parking. We rented a parking spot from the hotel for one day and the day that we needed to use the parking spot, the parking lot was full  so we had to park somewhere else.

reviews.positive_text: Generally fine but‚Ä¶
reviews.negative_text: I had a small but perfectly functional balcony at the back of the hotel. This was best used early as much of the day it was quite smelly being by the outlet vent for the kitchens! On a similar point, breakfast was ok and served up by personable young lady. Unfortunately she was under instructions to wash the adjoining restaurant floor so breakfast was often consumed with a strong blast of disinfectant!

reviews.positive_text: Absolutely fantastic location right next to the harbour/beach/train station. Modern rooms, lovely bed
reviews.negative_text: Claustrophobically small bathroom/shower in my single room

reviews.review_title: It was ideal for what i required for a one night stop over prior to working the next day. Staff were friendly and helpfu
reviews.positive_text: Clean and presentable and good value

reviews.review_title: A good location , helpful staff, however some instruction that the hotel is above Kashmir restaurant would have helped.
reviews.positive_text: The Hotel was in a very good location the check in staff were helpful.
reviews.negative_text: It was pretty clean but I did see two long hairs in the bathroom. I was not trying to look though because overall it was a good place.

reviews.review_title: A very convenient and comfortable overnight stay.
reviews.positive_text: Amazing location. Above a very nice Indian/fusion restaurant, right in the center of St-Raphael, and a few steps from all the hustle and bustle of Frejus. Easy access to everything with just a few steps from the property. The bed and pillows were comfortable - AC worked well. I had a very comfortable night's sleep. I'll definitely stay here again if traveling though on my own.
reviews.negative_text: The room was very small; however, I knew it would be, so I didn't expect more. The value was still amazing. Just a note - shower is very small - I'm 5'10" 200lbs, and it was a very tight fit and somewhat difficult to move around. Again, not problematic for me, but it could be for others.

reviews.review_title: Once there, not bad. Pretty area.
reviews.positive_text: Clean room. Small shower but good water pressure and heat. Good air conditioning. Nice food in Kashmiri restaurant next door. Gul was very helpful. At the harbor with easy walking around many restaurants and shops.
reviews.negative_text: Very difficult to find. Seems to be run by restaurant next door. On site quote for parking was ‚Ç¨8 but was charged ‚Ç¨17. Reception rarely open.

reviews.review_title: Very happy with the facilities and position of the hotel
reviews.positive_text:
Room is spacious enough and bathroom is very good. Stairs up to room a little steep but manageable. Bed very comfortable and room service daily was very good.
Hotel is in a prime spot on the marina front between two restaurants with lots of other bars and restaurants around it. 
Good promenade along the Frejus sea front
reviews.negative_text: Reception could have been a little more helpful in booking a cab for non-French speakers instead of just directing us to the station

reviews.positive_text: Wonderful hotel for a short stay at Saint-Raphael. Perfect location right on the embarquement of an old town. Very comfortable, stylish and clean. Comfortable bed with quality bed linen. All bathroom equipment is in full working order. Restaurant is nice too.
reviews.negative_text: Slow Wi-Fi

reviews.review_title: I would absolutely stay at this property again. It was beautiful, central and the staff were lovely.
reviews.positive_text: The most stunning location in the heart of Saint Raphael
reviews.negative_text: Nothing specific, we always love more pillows.

reviews.positive_text: Great location
Great place, great location and personal.
reviews.negative_text: Open hours are unapropriate

reviews.positive_text: The single room is cozy and lovely.Even there is no sight  to be seen.I feel relax and comfort there.
Location was perfect
Very comfortable, excellent location at a very reasonreasonable price.
The location of this hotel was great and my room was clean and comfortable. I had a very nice stay here for a week in October. Definitely stop by Calderon for sweets while in Saint-Raphael!

Although the single rooms were a bit small they are very well equipped and moderno y designed. They have ironing boards and irons and even earbuds and hairdryers. The rooms were cleaned very well and the location is the best of Saint Raphael.

reviews.review_title: Nice room but very noisy due to nearby nightclub
reviews.positive_text: Location
reviews.negative_text: Loud music until 3am from the nightclub across the road.

reviews.positive_text: Great Location to access all the the Port has to offer! Loved to beach, restaurants were great!
reviews.negative_text: Check in process could be improved, if we did not run into another guest it would have a lot longer to check in.

reviews.review_title: It was perfect and I finished off with a perfect coffee for me made downstairs
reviews.positive_text: Very friendly service. Air con was on when I arrived in the room everything looked nice. There was a fridge with chilled water. Great to be greeted by such a lovely room. Receptionist was nice too.
reviews.negative_text: The stairs going up to the room. Very difficult with heavy suitcases.

reviews.positive_text: I loved my stay here. 4 min from train station, in the best area of Saint raphael. I got The best service ever and the bed and breakfast was great. Thanx for this stay, you all!
